name: AOLIJIE SANITARY WARE CO.,LTD
overview:
Aolijie Sanitary Ware Co.,Ltd Established in 1998, Is an ISO9001:2008 Certified Factory Which Specialized in producing faucet, sensor taps, water purify taps, shower head, angle valve, fittings and bathroom sanitary ware. Our goods have good quality and competitive price, we have CUPC, NSF, CE, DVGW, ACS etc Certificate. They are welcomed in North America and many European market.

Our advantage: Material: ASTM, DIN standard Lead-free brass, copper content 63% Forging and Gravity Die Casting: high pressure solid body, smooth surfaces.

Spain SEDAL ceramic Cartridge, Neoperl aerator from Switzerland (NSF certificate)

Finish: Polished chrome plating, brush nickel (PVD) , oil rubbed bronze, paint etc.

Inlet hose: DVGW(KTW-A) and NSF Certificate stainless steel braided hose

Technic: First class workmanship, machined-precisedly, 100% high pressure tested.

OEM & ODM service available, we could manufacture faucets as per your samples.

More products and information please visit our website www.aolijiesanitary.com or contact us, we will send our catalog and price list to you once we got your reply email.
